definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: The tone is significantly affected by the weight and mass distribution of the vibrating plates.
sentences.chinese: 共振调节器改变音板的重量也就影响到乐器的基音。

sentences.english: The fundamental tone, is the lowest frequency in a harmonic series.
sentences.chinese: 基音，是指复合音中频率最低的成分。

sentences.english: An approach of the pitch detection for obtaining speech tone of Chinese trisyllabic words on the basis of the wavelet transforms is proposed .
sentences.chinese: 给出了一种基于小波变换的汉语三字词基音提取方法。

sentences.english: Voiced speech is interpreted as a concatenation of slowly evolving pitch cycle waveforms.
sentences.chinese: 浊音语音可以看作是慢变化的基音周期波形的连接。

sentences.english: Veracity of the phonetic pitch detection has a great influence on tone recognition.
sentences.chinese: 基音提取的准确度极大的影响声调识别的准确率。

sentences.english: The resonance modulator changes the weight of the plates and in turn affects the tone of the instrument.
sentences.chinese: 共振调节器改变音板的重量也就影响到乐器的基音。

definition: names of the notes of a musical scale (e.g. C, D, E or do, re, mi)
a note on a musical scale
sound producing object (soundboard, vibrating string, membrane etc)
